title: eSports coke vieuwing party for worlds finals
body:
Dear riot and players

So i went to the esports website fro coke viewing partys to check where i could view the finals in a theater. Since i viewed the finals in a theater only 5 km away from me i wanted to come this year aswell. However the eSports website only shows a theater about 150km away. So i went to the website of the theater 5km away and they show an event for the eSports coke viewing partys but are not listed on the official site. 

place: Hasselt
theater: Kinepolis.

Can someone confirm this is still offical? Since last year they where listed and we got Championship kalista cup as a goodie :) 

Thanx guys.
Nick

replies.body: Unfortunately, I don't have any information on venues that are holding viewing parties for worlds.  My recommendation would be to directly contact your local theater to confirm that it's a viewing hosted by Coke.  The list may have just missed it!  Good luck!
